summary: In 1870s, in the Sioux territory south of the Missouri, trapper and Indian scout Luther Yellowstone Kelly is hired by the army at Fort Buford but runs into trouble with the Sioux.
cast: Clint Walker|Edd Byrnes|John Russell|Ray Danton|Claude Akins|Rhodes Reason|Andra Martin|Gary Vinson|Warren Oates|Nesdon Booth|Buff Brady|Foster Hood|Clyde Howdy|Harry Shannon|Vincent St. Cyr|Chief Yowlachie
keywords: yellowstone|apache indian|new mexico territory|arapaho indian|blackfoot indian
title: Emboscada
